
```{r}
levels_fiveReceipts = levels(fiveReceipts)

levels_fiveReceipts

storage_fiveReceipts

chr_fiveReceipts = as.character(fiveReceipts)

chr_fiveReceipts

sum_fiveReceipts

```
